title: Crazy Days
lyrics:
Crazy Days is an early version of a song called “Yes Please” from the Hullabaloo Soundtrack.
The outro is a short section of what eventually became Execution Commentary.
[Verse 1]
I cannot sleep
There's too much noise in my head
I cannot sleep
I wanna be in here instead
[Pre-Chorus]
When I look at you
I know that you will never let me know
So why don't you just get out, out
[Chorus]
I never thought that this could come to this
I just wanna live my wedded bliss in peace now
You could not hear my shout
But I can
[Verse 2]
To my dismay
You went away
I cannot sleep
There's too much noise in my head
[Pre-Chorus]
When I look at you
I know that you will never let me know
So why don't you just get out, out

[Chorus]
I never thought that this could come to this
I just wanna live my wedded bliss in peace now
You could never miss (shh)
But I can
